author: gstein
msg: Ev2 shims:
Start moving from a list of Ev1 actions over to a single structure that
defines all the various changes to apply (via Ev2) to a given node.
For now, start with moving a text-change from the old action list over
to the new structure.
* subversion/libsvn_delta/compat.c:
(struct ev2_edit_baton): add a hash of changes
(ACTION_SET_TEXT): no longer needed
(struct path_checksum_args): removed. no longer used.
(enum restructure_action_t): the set of actions that affect the tree
structure, rather than a node's contents
(struct change_node): new structure to hold all the changes
(locate_change): new function to locate a change_node structure for
a given relpath, or create one if it doesn't exist
(process_actions): take an ev2 baton rather than a void*. add new
param for accepting a change_node structure. remove the processing
of ACTION_SET_TEXT, and look at similar fields in the change_node
structure.
(run_ev2_actions): take an ev2 baton rather than a void*. look up
any existing change_node structure and pass to process_actions()
(ev2_apply_textdelta): store the relevant change data into the new
change_node structure, rather than adding a SET_TEXT action
(delta_from_editor): initialize the new CHANGES member
